title: Science Learning Self-Efficacy Enhancement Program for Low-Literacy Workers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific concepts and experience applying science in daily life
context.additional_context: Strengthening science-domain vocational competencies for prospective teachers (pre-service teachers) to perform teaching roles.

learning_goals: Learners can successfully complete over five science micro-modules through mobile platforms within a week while improving learning self-efficacy by over 20%
Learners can record at least three positive learning experiences (e.g., peer feedback, practical task achievements) during training and develop self-directed learning attitudes
Learners can achieve over 80 points (out of 100) in science knowledge application case presentation evaluations at the end of the course

resources: Digital portfolio templates for peer assessment
Automated weekly learning progress tracking system

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
